Function reference version 3.4.4

Build trajectories

Methods for building trajectory objects

batch
separate
Add a batch/separate activity
branch
Add a branch activity
clone
synchronize
Add a clone/synchronize activity
create_trajectory
Create a trajectory
join
Join trajectories
leave
Add a leave activity
renege_abort
renege_in
Add a renege activity
rollback
Add a rollback activity
release
release_selected
seize
seize_selected
Add a seize/release activity
select
Select a resource
set_attribute
Add a set attribute activity
set_prioritization
Add a set prioritization activity
timeout
Add a timeout activity

Manage trajectories

Methods for getting information about trajectory objects

get_head
get_tail
Get the first/last activity
get_n_activities
Get the number of activities
get_next_activity
get_prev_activity
Get the next/prev activity
print_activity
Print an activity

Build and run simulation environments

Methods for building and running simulation objects

add_generator
Add a generator
add_resource
Add a resource
reset
Reset a simulator
onestep
run
Run the simulation
simmer
Create a simulator
wrap
Wrap a simulation environment

Manage simulation environments

Methods for getting information about simulation components

get_n_generated
Get the number of arrivals generated
now
Get current time
peek
Peek next events
get_capacity
get_queue_count
get_queue_size
get_server_count
resource
set_capacity
set_queue_size
Set/Get a resource's parameters

Statistics

Methods for getting monitored statistics

get_mon
get_mon_arrivals
get_mon_attributes
get_mon_resources
Get statistics

Convenience functions

Helper methods for generators and resources

at
Arrivals at specific times
from_to
Generate arrivals starting and stopping at specified times
from
Generate arrivals starting at a specified time
schedule
Generate a scheduling object
to
Generate arrivals stopping at a specified time

Plotting

Basic plotting functions

plot_attributes
Plot evolution of attribute data
plot_evolution_arrival_times
Plot evolution of arrival times
plot_resource_usage
Plot usage of a resource over time
plot_resource_utilization
Plot utilization of resources
